summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAnua PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pad is a hydration glow pad infused with PDRN, hyaluronic acid, and collagen, featuring a dual-fabric design for delivering deep moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsEasy-to-use pads infused with the key ingredients of ANUA PDRN serumDelivers deep hydration with skin-plumping PDRNSoft gel-coated fabric minimizes irritation for gentle useKey IngredientsPDRN (desodium EDTA): Salmon DNA-infused formula for skin rejuvenating & luminous glowHyaluronic Acid & Peptide: for layered hydration & firming care.Collagen: Patented 7D vita collagen for enhanced firmness.Research Results125.39% improvement in skin hydration immediately after use (temprorary effect)83.13% improves skin radiance10.62% improvement in deep hydration retention9.85% improvement of moisture-plumped cheeksItem 2641338How To UseAfter cleansing, apply the "Peptide Gel Side" to your skin.Leave it on for 5-10 minutes like a mini sheet mask.Use the "Plain Side" to wipe along your skin texture.Lightly pat in the remaining essence.After using, close the lid to prevent pads drying.Can be used every day, both AM & PM.Tip: Use as a quick morning mask while drying your hair.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, Niacinamide, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Diethoxyethyl Succinate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Hydroxyacetophenone, Glycereth-25 PCA Isostearate, Glycosyl Trehalose, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Xanthan Gum, Propanediol, Adenosine, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Disodium EDTA, Sodium DNA, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Coptis Japonica Root Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Zea Mays (Corn) Kernel Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Fructan, Glucose, Lecithin, Acetyl Glutamine, Collagen Extract, Bacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Folic Acid, Hexapeptide-11, Oligopeptide-1, Oligopeptide-2, Oligopeptide-3.
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply the "Peptide Gel Side" to your skin.Leave it on for 5-10 minutes like a mini sheet mask.Use the "Plain Side" to wipe along your skin texture.Lightly pat in the remaining essence.After using, close the lid to prevent pads drying.Can be used every day, both AM & PM.Tip: Use as a quick morning mask while drying your hair.

reviews.headline: Very Hydrating
reviews.comments: These pads are truly lovely. They can be used as a mask or swiped across the face leaving your face feeling hydrated and refreshed. The scent is nice and mild and I enjoy the smoothness that the serm leaves. This is a very good product. I can't wait to try the pink one.

reviews.headline: Not my fave, can push for more less synthetic.
reviews.comments:
I have checked the ingredients first before using this Glow Pad and the first and 2nd row of ingredients are mostly humectants, preservatives, and synthetic formulas but once you go down or in the lower row, you'll start to see natural once. The Olegopeptide-2 is a synthetic peptide but the 1 and 3 aren't. There's Disodium EDTA not our friend but tiny amount or percentage they said won't hurt. (Who knows!) 
I would like to write all the names but I rather what you to see it for yourself. 
Consistency is tacky for me and dries slow unless you will apply it in front of the fan. It does look like it is glowy in your skin because of the formulas mixed in this. I've been using this for a long time now but it just a kind of product that you will use now but it won't make such difference. It is soothing to the skin because of Hydroxyacetophenone a soothing agent. Better use 100% Aloe Vera than this. 
It is hydrating of course and makes your skin feels so flawless, no bumps, silky smooth (because of Glycereth-26). But I can get all these using other products that uses more natural.

reviews.headline: PDRN Glow Pad
reviews.comments:
My daughter suggested this product after I was out in the sun all day! My skin is textured and wrinkly but it did improve my skin.
 I wish it dried faster but I like it. I like that it is a pad and the tongs are nice as well.

reviews.headline: Great hydration
reviews.comments: This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review,My skin is glowing using this! I use it everyday and my skin has never looked better! I have very dry skin and this has helped a lot! I can see it being even better during the winter!

reviews.headline: Glow pad
reviews.comments: First time trying these theyre amazing! I noticed a difference the morning after, my skin feels soft and looks much brighter. Would recommend to try out, I have dry skin. Price isnt bad for these.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again

Its super gentle yet effective. This product is infused with PDRN, collagen & hyaluronic acid to lock in the moisture. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.comments: i love this ans how it can be used as a pad and a mask def is a good product wnd would recomend. makes me wanna try the other pads they make

reviews.headline: Love the dual benefits!!
reviews.comments: My skin loves this,it hydrates and soothes in just one step.my skin enjoyed long lasting  hydration with every single use and I observed a radiant and smoother skin glow .i used this with the pdrn serum and I love the results.This product was provided for promotional purposes  in exchange for my honest reviews

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments:
I've been using this PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pad for a few days now and I really like it. Anything with glow in the name is for me! These pads can be used in two ways, as a mask to target specific areas (place and leave for 5-10 mins) or you can swipe it all around for an all over glow. I love that it comes with tweezers to grab one out with ease. These pads are double sided, one the gel side that holds all the product, and the other plain to help lock in and distribute evenly. Ive been using these morning and night for that glow from within look. After just one use, you can see a noticable glow. My skin feels hydrated and the serum absorbs quickly in the skin without leaving a tacky feeling. I cant wait to continento use this product and even pair it with the PDRN glow serum. 

This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments:
Anything with glow in the name is for me. This Anua PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pad is perfect for anyone looking for that glass skin routine. My skin feels hydrated, and has that glow from within look. Its super gentle yet effective. This product is infused with PDRN, collagen & hyaluronic acid to lock in the moisture.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: These Anua PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pads are such a game changer for glowy, hydrated skin. The pads are soaked in essence and feel super cooling and soothing when applied. I love using them as a quick 5-minute mask in the morning to depuff and prep my skinâ€”my face instantly looks brighter and more refreshed. They're gentle, non-stripping, and perfect for sensitive skin. The hyaluronic acid gives a boost of hydration, while the PDRN helps with skin texture and bounce over time. I've even used them on my neck and chest before events, and the glow is unreal. They're easy, effective, and leave my skin looking juicy and healthy with no residue. Total must-have in my routine.

reviews.headline: Anua glow pad
reviews.comments: Wow so glad I have used these glow pads it's really has transformed my skin to smooth and glowing withen just few use!! Skin feels brighter hydrated and glowing healthy!! I used these after cleansing my face really well!! And before putting any other skincare products to see ultimate results

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments:
This product feels so good on my dry skin. it has improved the texture and elasticity of my sin. My skin is glowing and more radiant.  I thoroughly enjoyed using it.
This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments:
I've been using the Anua PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pad for a few weeks now, and I'm truly impressed. The pads are super gentle on my skin and packed with hydration. I love how they leave my face feeling fresh, soft, and visibly more radiant. The formula absorbs well without any sticky residue, and it's perfect for my sensitive skin. I use them in the morning or before makeup for that extra glow. Definitely a staple in my skincare routine!
 This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: Glow
reviews.comments: I recently tried the PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pad. The pad is infused with hyaluronic acid, which is known for its hydrating properties. As soon as I applied it to my skin, I could feel the moisture sinking in. It felt refreshing, like a cool drink for my face. I liked how easy it was to use. Just wipe it across your skin, and you're done! It really fits into my daily routine without any hassle.After using it for a few days, I noticed a nice glow to my skin. It's like my complexion looked brighter and more alive! The pad also claims to help with skin texture, and I can see that my skin feels a bit smoother. It's great because I usually struggle with dryness, especially in colder weather. I love products that deliver quick results, and this one definitely exceeded my expectations.  I received this for my honest review

reviews.headline: Nice Product, Medium Hydration
reviews.comments: I'm on the fence on whether or not I would repurchase, as I didn't feel or see a significant difference in hydration or glow on my skin. Overall, the glow pads were gentle on my skin and provide some glow during application.

reviews.headline: Glass Skin Effect
reviews.comments: I have been using these as my skin prep before I apply my makeup and my complexion has looked so good! I have been wanting to get into the PDRN regimen for awhile now and am happy I found these! They really give you that glowy finish and my skin is loving the ingredients! Korean skin care for the win! I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: So Soothing!
reviews.comments: I love these glow pads for my dry and itchy skin. If I feel like my skin needs more of a boost or something more soothing than just using a serum, I go for these. The pads themselves are soaked in serum and my skin soaks it up! There is very little, if any, fragrance. I use these after cleansing and my irritated skin feels so soothed and plumped afterwards. I wish the directions were a little more in-depth on the packaging, I had to do a little digging to find out that you leave the entire pad on the skin like a face mask. The size of the pads themselves are reasonable, I usually use 3 for my whole face with two on my cheeks and one on my forehead covering my eyebrow wrinkles. These would be good for someone whose skin needs some soothing love but doesn't want to commit to an entire face mask. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Glow pad anuaðŸ’¦
reviews.comments: I absolutely loved using the PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pad. The pads are perfectly soaked, soft, and gentle on the skin. From the first use, I noticed how hydrated, fresh, and plump my face looked. The hyaluronic acid deeply moisturizes, while the PDRN helps improve elasticity and gives a visible glow. They're quick and easy to use â€” perfect for busy mornings or a self-care evening.

reviews.headline: Swipe don't Scrub
reviews.comments: Let's be real â€” some exfoliating pads feel like they're trying to fight your skin instead of help it. But not this one. The ANUA Glow Pad is like a smooth operator that gently wipes away dullness without any drama. No harsh tingling, no tightness, no "uh-oh, I overdid it" moments. Just clean, calm, and polished skin after one swipe. I use it at night when I want to wake up and pretend I had a full 10 hours of sleep. It's pre-soaked and ready to roll, which makes it perfect for travel, lazy nights, or those "I can't do a 10-step routine" days. If your skin is sensitive, textured, or just tired, this is the step that brings the glow without the side-eye. Gentle enough for daily use, but effective enough to notice. Trust me â€” your skin will thank you.

media.headline: Soft, hydrating toner pads that soothe and brighten your ski

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have been using the PDRN 100 Hyaluronic Acid Glow Pad for just a few days and I already really like it. The pads come in a tub. Each pad is soaked in a smooth serum. I take one pad out after cleansing and gently wipe my face with it. The liquid feels cool and moist. I glide the pad around cheeks forehead and chin. It does not feel sticky or oily at all.

After the first use my skin felt soft and looked fresh. My face had a faint glow. After a couple of days I saw that dry spots around my nose looked less rough. The glow pad gave a gentle shine that looked natural and healthy. The serum absorbs fast and does not leave any residue. It made my skin feel calm and well hydrated.

Every morning after my toner and at night after washing I use one pad. It is easy and quick. I like that I can just swipe one pad and feel refreshed. Even under makeup my face felt smooth and happy. In the evening I follow with moisturizer and sleep feeling refreshed in the morning.

I have sensitive skin and had no irritation at all. I did not see redness or pimples. The pad felt soothing and clean. A few people mention a light smell from the pad but I did not notice any scent. The glow pad felt soft on my skin and did not tear or pull.

In only a few days I felt my skin look more even and feel more supple. My face had a subtle glow that looked like it comes from deep clean hydration. I feel like this is a nice simple step in my skin routine if you want skin that looks lively and feels soft. I will keep using it and see how skin looks in one week.

This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Does what it promised!

faceoff_negative.comments:
As someone who prefers toner pads over liquid toner, I like seeing this concept for what I might consider an essence. It screams hygienic and clean to me. I'm still on fence on how I feel about the formula though, as it's quite different from the other ones I've tried.

ðŸ« I wanted to love this but something about the texture felt so goopy to me that I almost didn't want to use it. I guess it's supposed to provide more than your standard dose of hydration, but for something that is supposed to gently exfoliate, it kind of felt too thick. 

ðŸ« I use this after cleansing and before applying moisturizer. Usually, right after the toner step, I go straight ahead and apply moisturizer without waiting. For this one though, I felt that I had to wait a little (around 10 minutes) post pad removal to let it fully absorb before I could go onto my moisturizer step. 

ðŸ« The packaging for this leaked everywhere for me once I removed the seal. You need it upright at all times, and if you hold it at an angle for even  a second, serum will leak out of the box. I wasn't a fan of this because as I was trying to move it around, liquid was slightly spilling out of the lid.

ðŸ« Formula wise, while it does take a bit to absorb, it does give a long lasting moisture that lasts for at least a day. I liked how glowy my skin looked and how easy it was to apply makeup the following day. It contains sodium based PDRN, which is great for all skin types, including sensitive ones. For context, I have combination skin that leans oily.

ðŸ« This is alcohol-free, fragrance-free, and essential oil-free formula. It didn't cause me to break out, nor did my pores feel like they were being congested. 

*I received this complimentary in exchange for an honest review. All thoughts are my own.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hydrating, but a Bit too Goopy
